analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0x817560b4cc45338393c7ede4ff5a99cefcdb5351.sol:
	Contract Cryptosquirrel has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0x817560b4cc45338393c7ede4ff5a99cefcdb5351.sol#205)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x817560b4cc45338393c7ede4ff5a99cefcdb5351.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/22/0x817560b4cc45338393c7ede4ff5a99cefcdb5351.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0x817560b4cc45338393c7ede4ff5a99cefcdb5351.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
